ca.ualberta.c301w19t14.onebook.adapters

Class NotificationsAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<NotificationsAdapter.NotificationsViewHolder>
      • ca.ualberta.c301w19t14.onebook.adapters.NotificationsAdapter

  • public class NotificationsAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<NotificationsAdapter.NotificationsViewHolder>
    RecyclerView adapter for notifications. Handles displaying and clicking on notifications. Future improvements include having location for a meet up show when a meet up notification is clicked.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    CMPUT301 Team14: Natalie H, Dimitri T
    See Also:
    NotificationFragment
